tool_description: A set of simple end-points to convert DNA and mRNA sequences to amino-acids

api_list.name: DNA2mRNA
api_list.description: This end-point converts a DNA sequence into an mRNA sequence.

required_parameters.name: dna
required_parameters.description: The DNA sequence to transform into an mRNA sequence.

api_list.name: DNA2AminoAcid
api_list.description: Transform a DNA sequence into a sequence of Amino Acids

required_parameters.name: dna
required_parameters.description: The DNA sequence used for the transformation to Amino Acids

api_list.name: mRNA2AminoAcid
api_list.description: Transform an mRNA sequence into a sequence of Amino Acids.

required_parameters.name: mRNA
required_parameters.description: The mRNA sequence used to find the Amino Acid sequence.

api_list.name: mRNA2DNA
api_list.description: This endpoint transforms an mRNA sequence to its DNA sequence equivalent.

required_parameters.name: mRNA
required_parameters.description: The mRNA sequence as a string of letters.
